oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cane engraved by Robert Hall, Co. D., 6th Tenn. Inf., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Vine cane engraved by Robert Hall, Co. D., 6th Tenn. Inf., CSA. "Holly Grove, Ark." is engraved on the end of the cane. "Robt. B. Hall, Co. D 6th Tenn. Inft., Maney's Brig., Cheatham's Div., Hardee's Corps" is engraved on the handle. The battles Hall fought in are engraved on the body: "Shiloh, Perryville, Chickamauga, Cat Creek, Resaca, Atlanta, Murfreesboro, Missionary Ridge, New Hope, Jonesboro, Franklin, Kennesaw Mountain, Love Joy, Nashville.""Surrendered at Greensboro, N.C., April 26th 1865," is also carved on the cane. The chest was featured in the "Three Stars of Tennessee With a Focus on Western Tennessee" (exhibition catalog).
